DOC.detailed_description: Studies suggest dietary calcium intake inversely associate cardiovascular disease , supplementary calcium appear associate raise risk cardiovascular event . Fatty meal lead oxidative inflammation seem interfere postprandial dismetabolism , predictor cardiovascular event . To investigate calcium acute influence postprandial effect fatty meal crossover , control , randomize clinical trial conduct obese adult woman randomize one three intervention , characterize fatty meal different content calcium : low calcium ( 40 mg ) , high dietary calcium ( 540 mg non-fat milk ) , high supplementary calcium ( 540 mg calcium carbonate ) . Each participant receive three meal one every week . Before meal ' intake blood sample collect endothelial function ass perform . Participants eat specific meal endothelial function assess 120 minute . Blood sample collection repeat every 60 minute meal 's intake perform latter biochemical analyzes determine : 8-isoprostane level , assess oxidative stress status ; triglyceride ; glucose ; insulin ; serum calcium . Blood pressure continuously assess 25 minute meal ' intake 2 hour .
